task.title: Running tasks on nodes
task.shortdesc: To help fix vulnerabilities, run ad-hoc tasks on target nodes to upgrade packages, restart services, execute shell commands, or perform any other type of single-action executions on vulnerable nodes.

context.p:
There are a number of ways to select a task:
From the left hand pane.
On any nodes listing page.
On any details page relating to a specific vulnerability, node, or package.

When selecting to run a task from either a details or listing page, some of the selected nodes may not be eligible to run the task on. An eligible node must be accessible using the SSH or WinRM credentials you added, or if running the install agent task, an eligible node doesn't have the agent installed.
